content: pink alien crochet pattern by crochetgrove table of contents skills required abbreviations materials 1 special stitch instructions 2 materials 3 inner ears 4 outer ear 5 arms sitting legs 6 sitting body and head 7 legs standing 8 connecting legs standing/ head 9 antenna 10 assembly 11 1 skills required magic_ring single_crochet invisible decrease fasten_off chain increase 3 single crochet increase slip_stitch treble_crochet bobble front loop only back loop only -if you are unfamiliar with any of these skills there are tons abbreviations of very helpful youtube videos magic_ring- magic_ring to help you single_crochet- single_crochet decrease- decrease fo- fasten_off chain- chain increase- increase 3scinc- 3 single_crochet increase 3sc in the same stitch slip_stitch- slip_stitch trbo- treble_crochet bobble flo- front loop only blo- back loop only important info this pattern has a standing and sitting option for the alien the head ears and arms are worked the same for both the only difference is the legs and body 2 color change instructions 3scinc instructions -stop crocheting right before you pull through -work a single_crochet the last two loops on the crochet hook drop -work another single_crochet the old color of yarn stitch inserting your hook in -put the new yarn color on the hook and use the new color to pull through the last two same stitch loops on the hook -work the third single_crochet stitch inserting your hook in same stitch trbo instructions -to make a treble bobble stitch yarn over twice -insert hook into stitch yarn over again and pull up a loop -yarn over and pull through the first 2 loops on the hook -yarn over and pull through the next 2 loops on hook -repeat the steps above in the same stitch a total of 4 times do not pull through the remaining loops until there are 5 loops on the hook -yarn over pull through all loops on hook materials i used 3 premier yarns parfait chunky cotton candy approx 25 g premier yarns parfait chunky bubblegum approx 93 g premier yarns parfait chunky lilac buy parfait approx 5 g chunky here premier yarns parfait chunky white approx 1 g felt i use stiffened felt with heat and bond on the back and cut the whites the eyes 1 38in x 1 53in the black of the eye is 1in x 1 11in for the nose i use lilac felt with heat and bond on the back and cut it at the size 1 1in x 0 78in you can adjust the sizes if needed felt templates other supplies 4mm crochet hook stitch heat and bond markers yarn needle stuffing scissors 4 right inner ear r1 in cottoncandy ch9 turn your work and place 8sc down the chain then working in the back side of the chains place 8sc for a total of 16sc in round 1 r2 increase 6sc increase x2 6sc increase 20 r3 increase x2 7sc increase x3 7sc increase 26 in the next round place a stitch marker on the front loop
